Uses of Class
domain.Environment

Packages that use Environment
domain   
 

Uses of Environment in domain
 

Subclasses of Environment in domain
 class DinamicEnvironment
          This class is intended to be an Environment specialitzation in wich the Scenario dimensions are bigger as the GameFrame dimension or GameApplet dimension, and so on the Scenario instance should take care of implementig its render method to get only the screenvisible region rendered.
 class PerCoordinatesDinamicEnvironment
           
 class PerCoordinatesStaticEnvironment
           
 class StaticEnvironment
          This class is intended to be an Environment specialitzation in wich the Scenario dimensions are the same as the GameFrame dimension or GameApplet dimension.
 class TiledDinamicEnvironment
           
 class TiledStaticEnvironment

          The Environment reference for the Sprite instance

Methods in domain with parameters of type Environment

          This method adds the passed Environment instance to the current GameClient.
